sql: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS movie_title FROM keyword AS k, movie_info AS mi, movie_keyword AS mk, title AS t WHERE k.keyword  like '%sequel%' AND mi.info  IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Denish', 'Norwegian', 'German') AND t.production_year > 2005 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(mk k t mi)
 HashJoin(mk k t)
 MergeJoin(mk k)
 BitmapScan(mk)
 BitmapScan(k)
 IndexScan(t)
 BitmapScan(mi)
 Leading((((mk k) t) mi)) */
